Hey! Now using news. Check out all the features in the settings window (maybe turn them on or off) or click the link.
Latest updates: - Lots of overlays, and they auto-show when using certain tools. - Caravans are auto-filled with things that are selected on the map. - Blueprints can be designated with any stuff : right click the button to get the list - Zone/Range highlighting looks a lot better (it's the corners)|img:AreaHighlightBad,AreaHighlightGood|
(Open mods settings to turn this on) - Clicking names in Pawn tables (e.g. the Work tab) now highlight and select pawns just like clicking them on the map does, instead of closing the tab and jumping to them. Alt-click to close and jump like before.|img:TableSelection|
- Geothermal vents are highlighted when building generators. - Panning the camera with the middle-mouse button is better.
